description:
Fernando`s Tauros was entered into the Kentauros Battles at the trade meet festival at a town near Kogane City by his trainer Fernando. It won its 10th consecutive win in the tournament and the announcer was just about to declare it the victor as there was no more challengers when Ash challenged Fernando to a battle.
The battle didn`t last too long and it looked like Fernando`s Tauros was going to win but in a last effort, Ash`s Tauros used Take Down which flipped over Fernando`s Tauros and gave Ash the win.
name: Kentauros (Mitsuji)
